firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.elasticsearch¶

class firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.elasticsearch.ElasticSearch(api: FiremonAPI, app: App)¶

Bases: object

Represent actions on the Elastic Search endpoint.

Parameters:

  • api (obj) – FiremonAPI()

  • app (obj) – App()

ep_name = 'es'¶
reindex() → bool | dict | str | bytes¶

Mark Elastic Search for reindex

Returns:

bool

url = None¶

FireMon-API is a Python web wrapper for the FireMon SIP (Security Mangager, etc...) APIs. The intent is make something that is useful for quick and easy development against FireMon products.
